job_tasks.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology (both from a creative tooling & pipeline perspective and our end-user software).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the broader technical and creative goals of the company and translate them into actionable technology development, aligning with the CTO's vision.

job_tasks.phrase: Guiding and make pipeline technology choices and define the future architecture of our technology platform.
job_tasks.justification: This involves strategic decision-making about technology direction, which is tied to business objectives and long-term platform evolution.

job_tasks.phrase: Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams to identify shared (technical) approaches.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration on technical approaches, implying the development or integration of software components.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with our artists to develop the tools and automation they need.
job_tasks.justification: This directly involves the development of software tools to meet the specific needs of users (artists).

job_tasks.phrase: Build, test & deploy frequent changes and updates to the pipeline.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the continuous process of building, testing, and deploying software updates, which falls under MLOps/DevOps practices for a technology pipeline.

job_tasks.phrase: Document and possibly train artists to use the pipeline, pick up enhancements and implement directly.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how the technology serves its users (artists) and facilitating its adoption and improvement, which requires understanding the business context of its usage.

soft_skills.phrase: In close collaboration with our CTO and different technical and artistic teams
Close collaboration with our Grip development and technical teams
pick up enhancements and implement directly
define the future architecture of our technology platform.
define, develop and run the next version of our rendering technology
Guiding and make pipeline technology choices

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on rendering technology, creative tooling, and pipeline development within a creative/artistic context. It lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant for an AI-focused role.
